name: Eclipse Dining Plates
description:
Elevate your dining experience with our stunning dinnerware collection, where contemporary design meets timeless elegance. Crafted from premium ceramic, each plate showcases a mesmerizing gradient that shifts from deep midnight blue to a soft celestial shimmer, reminiscent of a breathtaking evening sky. These plates not only serve as functional dinnerware but also as captivating centerpieces, sparking conversation and admiration at every gathering.

Designed with depth and versatility in mind, the plates are perfect for everything from casual family dinners to sophisticated entertaining. Their generous size accommodates hearty portions, while the subtle raised rim helps to keep sauces and sides neatly contained. I recently picked up these dining plates, and they’re alright. They look nice on the table, a bit modern and all that, but there are some downsides. For one, I noticed some scratches forming after just a couple of uses, which is kinda disappointing. Also, the size is kind of awkward for some meals. You end up piling things on, and it doesn't always fit. 

They wash up fine in the dishwasher, though, so that’s a plus. I guess they work
